recipe.title: Cranberry, Gingerly
ingredients: 1 1/2 tablespoons thawed cranberry juice cocktail concentrate
instructions: Shake ingredients with ice in a cocktail shaker. Strain into a Martini glass. Garnish with a slice of crystallized ginger.
